short_summary: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSCP) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is purchasing 90 wood stoves Alpine CS14 or equivalent, and requires delivery in St-Jean-Sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada. Bidders are required to submit all necessary documents and their bid by January 6, 2023 at 2 PM EST.
description: This is a competitive request for proposal for the acquisition of 90 wood stoves Alpine CS14 or equivalent, including delivery. The specifications and details can be found in Annex A. The bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number Doc3735492649 - W3380-22J005 dated November 7, 2023, with a closing of December 6, 2022, at 2 PM EST. Bidders who bid on the previous solicitation will receive a debriefing or feedback session.
full_summary:
## Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Title
W3380-22J005-2 - Request for Proposal for the Acquisition of Wood Stoves

### Acronyms and Definitions

* DND: Department of National Defence
* PSPC: Department of Public Works and Government Services
* CFTA: Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* ALE: Accord de Libre Échange Canadien

### Tender Details

| Field Name | Field Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation # | W3380-22J005-2 |
| Closing Date | [2023-01-06T14:00:00](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14940364) |
| Amendment # | 1 |
| Reference # | WS3734668523 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | [2022-12-10](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14940364) |
| Expected Contract End Date | [2023-07-15](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14940364) |
| Location | Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada

### Tender Description

The Department of Defense of National Defense is inviting proposals from qualified suppliers for the acquisition of 90 wood stoves, Alpine CS14 or equivalent, including delivery. Suppliers must submit their bids electronically through the Ariba Discover platform.

### Evaluation Criteria

The proposal will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Lowest Price

### Request for Proposal Conditions

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by [2023-01-06T14:00:00](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14940364). Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

A debriefing or feedback session will be provided to bidders who request it.

### Contact Information

* Name: Pierre-Luc Dube
* Email: pierre-luc.dube@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note that the tender is now closed and the deadline has expired. 

It took me a while to put everything in order, and ensure that everything is clear and concise. Good luck with your reference submission. --AnnaMaria61 2023/01/18 03:37:00 Z ( UTC ) dk2+[ semantics ] [ Istanbul maintained it * generated notes ] zk Keynes scant **
